name: DDXCAW Smart Watch
description: Smart Watch for Women Men Answer/Make Call,1.85 HD Screen Fitness tracker with Step Counter,140+ Sport Modes Smartwatch with Heart Rate Sleep Monitor,IP68 Waterproof Activity Tracker for Android iOS
details: ğŸ”µã€Bluetooth Voice Callsã€‘Stay connected with friends, colleagues, and loved ones right on your wrist. Phone calls can be answered on the P2 smart watch with only a tap. Whether you are working or doing exercise, you can raise your hand to answer phone calls, so you don't miss anything important.

ğŸ”µã€Phenomenal Visual Experienceã€‘The DDXCAW P2 Fitness Tracker features a 1.85-inch TFT display with a refresh rate up to 60Hz and a 390*450 resolution. One screen, all excitement. More than 100+ watch faces allow you to change themes at your will. It is easy to show your unique personality at the raise of your hand.

ğŸ”µã€140+ Multiple Fitness Modesã€‘The DDXCAW P2 Activity Tracker offers you more than 140+ sport modes, including 12 professional sports modes (running, walking, cycling, swimming, football, etc). The built-in sensors and professional sports algorithms can monitor and analyse your body when you do your favourite sports, showing your efforts at a glance.

ğŸ”µã€All-Day Health Trackingã€‘Maximize and maintain workout intensity with DDXCAW's heart rate monitor technology. Using AI-driven algorithms for high-precision readings and infrared technology, it offers continuous 24/7 heart rate monitoring, so you stay in the fitness zone longer.

ğŸ”µã€IP68 Waterproof Watchã€‘This fitness watch comes with IP68 and 5 ATM ratings for water resistance, and has withstood a staggering 200 water pressure cycles, so you can even wear it while using any of the 10+ water sports modes on the watch.

ğŸ”µã€Smart Convenience Redefinedã€‘Simply lift your wrist to field incoming calls, preview messages or take selfies and group photos. Misplaced your phone? No worries. When paired with your phone, the phone finder function will locate it instantly.

ğŸ”µã€Always-on Battery Life & Compatibilityã€‘The P2 smartwatch offers 14 days of battery life in typical usage scenarios, and equips with magnetic fast charging to free you from long recharge times. Advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology enables faster transmission speeds and stable connectivity for devices. Compatible with iOS 9.0, Android 5.0 and above devices.
